outcomeMeasures.title: Triglyceride Concentration (Percent Change From Baseline)
outcomeMeasures.description: To determine the efficacy of fenofibrate monotherapy after 2 months of treatment to improve the lipoprotein profile; a successful response will be defined as a 25% reduction in the serum TG concentration at 2 months.

outcomeMeasures.title: Triglyceride Concentration (Percent Change From Baseline)
outcomeMeasures.description: To determine the efficacy of fenofibrate monotherapy to lower TG concentration at 4 months of treatment, when the peak therapeutic efficacy to drug treatment has been reported to occur.

outcomeMeasures.title: Adverse Event Profile
outcomeMeasures.description: Documentation and description of adverse events will be obtained in subjects who have received drug treatment compared to events occurring in the control group.
